# Mobile American Notary & Apostilles

> Mobile notary and apostille service based in Granada Hills, serving Los Angeles County, Orange County, and Ventura County. We help clients apostille court orders, vital records, school documents, business records, and federal documents for use overseas, and provide mobile notary, hospital, estate planning, jail, and real estate signing services throughout the region.

## Core pages

- [Home](https://www.mobileamericannotary.com/): Overview of mobile notary, apostille, jail, livescan, and translation services, service area, and contact options.
- [Notary services](https://www.mobileamericannotary.com/services/notary.html): Mobile notary at homes, offices, hospitals, care facilities, and jails.
- [Jail notary services](https://www.mobileamericannotary.com/services/notary-jail.html): Mobile notary for inmates at Los Angeles County jails and detention centers.
- [Apostille services](https://www.mobileamericannotary.com/services/apostille.html): Main hub for apostille information and document families.
- [Livescan services](https://www.mobileamericannotary.com/services/livescan.html): Livescan fingerprinting and related identity services.
- [Translations](https://www.mobileamericannotary.com/services/translations.html): Document translation support connected to notary and apostille work.
- [Pricing](https://www.mobileamericannotary.com/pricing.html): Typical fees and turnaround options.
- [About](https://www.mobileamericannotary.com/about.html): Background, experience, and service philosophy.
- [Privacy policy](https://www.mobileamericannotary.com/privacy.html): Privacy practices and data handling.
- [Terms of service](https://www.mobileamericannotary.com/terms.html): Terms for using services and the website.
- [Apostille intake form](https://www.mobileamericannotary.com/apostille-intake-form.html): Secure form to share document details and timelines.
- [SMS consent](https://www.mobileamericannotary.com/sms-consent.html): Information and consent for text message communication.

## Notary specialty landing pages

- [Estate planning notary](https://www.mobileamericannotary.com/landing/notary-estate-planning-los-angeles.html) – Estate planning & power of attorney mobile notary visits in Los Angeles (homes, law offices, hospitals, care facilities).
- [Hospital & medical notary](https://www.mobileamericannotary.com/landing/notary-hospital-medical-los-angeles.html) – Hospital & medical-facility mobile notary for bedside signings and medical paperwork.
- [Real estate notary](https://www.mobileamericannotary.com/landing/notary-real-estate-los-angeles.html) – Mobile notary for real estate closings, deeds, loan documents, and escrow signings.

## Jail notary facility pages

- [Men's Central Jail (MCJ)](https://www.mobileamericannotary.com/landing/notary-jail-mens-central.html) – Mobile notary at Men's Central Jail in downtown Los Angeles.
- [Twin Towers Correctional Facility](https://www.mobileamericannotary.com/landing/notary-jail-twin-towers.html) – Mobile notary at Twin Towers in downtown Los Angeles.
- [Pitchess Detention Center](https://www.mobileamericannotary.com/landing/notary-jail-pitchess.html) – Mobile notary at Pitchess Detention Center (North, South, East) in Castaic.
- [North County Correctional Facility (NCCF)](https://www.mobileamericannotary.com/landing/notary-jail-north-county-castaic.html) – Mobile notary at NCCF in Castaic.
- [Century Regional Detention Facility (CRDF)](https://www.mobileamericannotary.com/landing/notary-jail-crdf-lynwood.html) – Mobile notary at CRDF women's facility in Lynwood.
